I am an Assistant Research Professor in the Lucy Family Institute for Data & Society at the University of Notre Dame. I completed my PhD in Economics from the University of Arizona in 2019.

I am an Applied Microeconomist with research interests in Labor Economics and Development Economics. 

You can download my CV from this link: [CV](files/CV.pdf)

Email: smotghare@nd.edu
